content: mc work garter stitch pattern row 1 & 2 19 times 19 sts increase d 136 sts with mc work row 11 & 12 as follows repeat single slip_stitch pattern row 1-18 once row 11 rs repeat row 3 9 sts increase d 145 sts 1 st increase d with mc work garter stitch pattern row 1 & 2 row 12 ws repeat row 4 19 times 19 sts increase d 164 sts with cc held double work row 13 & 14 as follows repeat single slip_stitch pattern row 1-18 once 9 sts increase d 173 sts row 13 rs repeat row 5 1 st increase d with mc work garter stitch pattern row 1 & 2 19 times 19 sts increase d 192 sts row 14 ws repeat row 6 repeat single slip_stitch pattern row 1-18 with mc work row 15 & 16 as follows 9 sts increase d 201 stitches row 15 rs repeat row 3 with mc work garter stitch pattern row 1 & 2 1 st increase d 19 times 19 sts increase d 220 sts row 16 ws repeat row 4 repeat single slip_stitch pattern row 1-18 but do not cut cc with cc held double work row 17 & 18 as follows 9 sts increase d 229 sts row 17 rs repeat row 1 cut mc continuing with cc held double work 1 st increase d garter stitch pattern row 1 & 2 18 times then work just row 1 once row 18 ws repeat row 2 19 sts increase d 248 sts you should have 61 sts at this point with ws facing bobble all sts loosely knitwise cut cc finishing weave in all ends on the ws and wet block to measurements 4 sugar shawl version 1 // @2022 the lamb & kid //
